ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Organiser_Website__c = "http://." || Organiser_Website__c = "N/A" || Organiser_Website__c = "n/a" || Organiser_Website__c = "TBC" || Organiser_Website__c = "tbc" || Organiser_Website__c = "TBD" || Organiser_Website__c = "tbd" || Organiser_Website__c == "Already Set Up" || Organiser_Website__c == "already set up" || Organiser_Website__c == "unknown" || Organiser_Website__c = "."
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Organiser web address. Data quality is important
